n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
a=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the lower bound:"))
b=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the upper bound:"))
if(a>=min(arr)&&b<=max(arr)){
  arr=c(arr[arr<a],arr[arr>=a&arr<=b],arr[arr>b])
  print(1)
}else{
  print(-1)
}
